IRC.migrateWorldStart: Migrating world data to the system's enrichers
IRC.migrateWorldEnd: Migrating world data to the system's enrichers complete
IRC.migrateCompendiumStart: Migrating pack {pack} to the system's enrichers
IRC.migrateCompendiumEnd: Migrating pack {pack} to the system's enrichers complete
IRC.migrateParagraph1: Migrate the world data (actors, items, and unlinked tokens on scenes) or compendium packs. This will convert any Inline Roll Commands to the new enrichers the D&D 5e system includes.
IRC.migrateParagraph2: Example: [[/rollSkill ath]] is converted to [[/skill ath]]
IRC.migrateBackupWarning: Backup your data before migrating, just in case.
